review: We are thankful for the valuable and best treatment given by Dr.Bela Kedia nd Dr Freni shah to my daughter for her successful hysteroscopy and laparoscopy surgery..really appreciate your efforts and care ..also good service by Fortis hospital and staff, especially the nurses, really appreciate it.

Consulted for fertility/pregnancyDr. Bela has always explained things to me & my husband in simple terms and with utmost patience. Her straight forward way of giving clarity on every option has helped us to take very informed decisions. She never pushed us to do any unnecessary tests and was always ready to explain things to us in a peaceful manner with utmost clarity.We are highly indebted to her for guiding us through the pregnancy journey and blessing our baby girl. Bela mam is truly our baby's god mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The doctor taught me mindful treatment of the problem. She advised me to keep my mind happy and relaxed always and also to spread the good vibes to others.

I had met the doctor and it was for gynaecology related. Consultation went well. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. Medicines was prescribed by doctor duringÂ consultation. Biopsy was done. Hormonal test was done.  Healthy diet was suggested and control weight. Doctor was friendly. Hospitality was good.
